pageContext.public_note: Registration for Summer 2019 camps begins on Monday, January 14th.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Gear up for a full-day LEGO® camp packed with hands-on and minds-on STEM fun! In this challenge based program, build dizzying Teacup Rides, customized Cuckoo clocks, and the historic Wright Flyer. Then use the force to raise your X-Wing from the Dagobah swamp, challenge the AT-AT walkers on Hoth, and fly the Millennium Falcon through the Kessel Run. Learn about BOTH kinds of The Force in this new full-day advanced engineering camp for LEGO® fanatics!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM Challenge + Jedi w/ LEGO® Materials: FULL DAY
pageContext.action_url_comment: This is a full day camp option with Play-Well TEKnologies.
